name: 11th Edition of International Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology
content: Building upon the success of our previous 10 editions of conference on catalysis and chemical engineering, Magnus Group seeks the honour of your presence at its “11th edition of International Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology” (CCT 2022) Keeping the global pandemic in view, this year we have decided to host CCT in a hybrid format with both virtual and in-person version at Tokyo, Japan during May 16-17, 2022\. The theme chosen for this year is “Exploring critical breakthroughs in Catalysis and chemical engineering.”
